DOC.brief_title: IVF Treatment Women With Immature Oocytes Previous Cycle
DOC.detailed_description: Patients prospectively randomize two group . The randomization organize computer . The hCG group- trigger final follicular maturation high dose hCG ( 500 mcg ) -38 hour prior oocyte aspiration , Double trigger Group- receive gonadotropin-releasing hormone ( GnRH ) agonist ( Decapeptyl 0.2mg ) 40 hour prior oocyte aspiration hCG ( 250mcg ) 34 hour prior oocyte aspiration . All patient supplement progesterone preparation ( Crinone gel 8 % day ) luteal support . Women suffer vaginal spot vaginal bleeding luteal phase receive supplementation Geston 50MG intramuscular every 2 day . At day oocyte aspiration , blood drawn serum LH , FSH , estrogen ( E2 ) progesterone . Moreover , clear follicular fluid collect tested LH , FSH , E2 progesterone level .
